collectors.titleDetails: (12 total Queries, 11 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>16. C5</p> <p>16. C7</p> <p>16. C2</p>', '1.1', '<p>IFRS 16 is applied using one of the following two methods: </p> <p>(a) The “retrospective” method: apply the Standard retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, subject to the expedients in paragraph IFRS 16.C3; or</p> <p>(b) The “cumulative effect” method: retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying IFRS 16 recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the annual reporting period that includes the date of initial application. </p> <p><i>For the purposes of the transition requirements, the date of initial application is the start of the reporting period in which an entity first applies this Standard (i.e. 1 January 2019 for a 31 December 2019 year-end);</i></p> <h6>Confirm here which transition method is being used: </h6> <h6>Retrospective method / Cumulative effect method </h6> <p>Have the appropriate sections of the checklist below been completed? </p>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<h6>2</h6>', '<h6>Transition to IFRS 16 using the “Retrospective” method</h6>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>16. C5</p> <p>IAS</p> <p>8.22</p>', '2.1', '<p>Has the entity disclosed the adjustments made to the opening balance of each affected component of equity for the earliest prior period presented and the other comparative amounts disclosed for each prior period presented as if IFRS 16 had always been applied?</p>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>16. C5</p><p>IAS</p> <p>8.28</p>', '2.2', '<p>When the initial application of IFRS 16 has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:</p> <p>(a) The title of the IFRS;</p> <p>(b) Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</p> <p>(c) The nature of the change in accounting policy;</p> <p>(d) Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</p> <p>(e) Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effect on future periods;</p> <p>(f) For the immediately prior period presented, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the statement of cash flows); </p> <p>(g) The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </p> <p>(h) If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</p> ', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p>\r\n<p>16. C3</p>', '2.3', '<p>When applying IFRS 16 using the Retrospective method, an entity can take advantage of the practical expedient set out in IFRS 16. C3.</p>\r\n<p>If this expedient has been taken advantage of, has this fact been disclosed? </p>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<h6>3</h6>', '<h6>Transition to IFRS 16 using the “Cumulative effect” method</h6>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>15. C8</p>', '3.1', '<p>For leases previously classified as operating leases under IAS 17, has the entity recognised the following at the date of initial application:</p> <ul> <li> A lease liability; and</li> <li> A right of use asset? </li> </ul> <p><i>The date of initial application is 1 January 2019 for a 31 December 2019 year end. </i></p>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p>\r\n<p>16. C10, C13</p>', '3.2', '<p>When applying IFRS 16 using the Cumulative effect method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 16. C10.</p>\r\n<p>Where one or more of the practical expedients has been taken advantage of, has the entity disclosed that fact? </p>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IFRS</p> <p>16. C12</p>', '3.2', '<p>Is there disclosure of the following: </p> <p>(a) The weighted average lessee’s incremental borrowing rate applied to lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application; and</p> <p>(b) an explanation of any difference between:</p> <ul> <li>operating lease commitments disclosed applying IAS 17 at the end of the annual reporting period immediately preceding the date of initial application, discounted using the incremental borrowing rate at the date of initial application as described in IFRS 16.C8(a); and</li> <li>lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4h', '3.15.8 Ab4h', '67', 'Active', '2024-04-01 19:00:30')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>IFRS 16 is applied using one of the following two methods: </p>
<p>(a)	The “retrospective” method: apply the Standard retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors, subject to the expedients in paragraph IFRS 16.C3; or</p>
<p>(b)	The “cumulative effect” method: retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying IFRS 16 recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings (or other component of equity, as appropriate) of the annual reporting period that includes the date of initial application. </p>
<p><i>For the purposes of the transition requirements, the date of initial application is the start of the reporting period in which an entity first applies this Standard (i.e. 1 January 2019 for a 31 December 2019 year-end);</i></p>
<h6>Confirm here which transition method is being used: </h6>
<h6>Retrospective method / Cumulative effect method </h6>
<p>Have the appropriate sections of the checklist below been completed? </p>
    [1] => <h6>Transition to IFRS 16 using the “Retrospective” method</h6>
    [2] => <p>Has the entity disclosed the adjustments made to the opening balance of each affected component of equity for the earliest prior period presented and the other comparative amounts disclosed for each prior period presented as if IFRS 16 had always been applied?</p>
    [3] => <p>When the initial application of IFRS 16 has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:</p>
<p>(a)	The title of the IFRS;</p>
<p>(b)	Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</p>
<p>(c)	The nature of the change in accounting policy;</p>
<p>(d)	Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</p>
<p>(e)	Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effect on future periods;</p>
<p>(f)	For the immediately prior period presented, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the statement of cash flows); </p>
<p>(g)	The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </p>
<p>(h)	If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</p>

    [4] => <p>When applying IFRS 16 using the Retrospective method, an entity can take advantage of the practical expedient set out in IFRS 16. C3.</p>
<p>If this expedient has been taken advantage of, has this fact been disclosed? </p>
    [5] => <h6>Transition to IFRS 16 using the “Cumulative effect” method</h6>
    [6] => <p>For leases previously classified as operating leases under IAS 17, has the entity recognised the following at the date of initial application:</p>
<ul>
    <li>	A lease liability; and</li>
    <li>	A right of use asset? </li>
</ul>
<p><i>The date of initial application is 1 January 2019 for a 31 December 2019 year end. </i></p>
    [7] => <p>When applying IFRS 16 using the Cumulative effect method, an entity can take advantage of certain practical expedients, as set out in IFRS 16. C10.</p>
<p>Where one or more of the practical expedients has been taken advantage of, has the entity disclosed that fact? </p>
    [8] => <p>Is there disclosure of the following: </p>
<p>(a)	The weighted average lessee’s incremental borrowing rate applied to lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application; and</p>
<p>(b)	an explanation of any difference between:</p>
<ul>
    <li>operating lease commitments disclosed applying IAS 17 at the end of the annual reporting period immediately preceding the date of initial application, discounted using the incremental borrowing rate at the date of initial application as described in IFRS 16.C8(a); and</li>
    <li>lease liabilities recognised in the statement of financial position at the date of initial application.</li>
</ul>
    [9] => <h6>Transition to IFRS 16 using the “Cumulative effect” method</h6>
    [10] => <p>When the initial application of IFRS 16 has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:</p>
<p>(a)	The title of the IFRS;</p>
<p>(b)	Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</p>
<p>(c)	The nature of the change in accounting policy;</p>
<p>(d)	Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</p>
<p>(e)	Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effect on future periods;</p>
<p>(f)	The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </p>
<p>(g)	If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied.</p>

)
